extensionDescription.message: Reveals the original destinations of the links and Twitter Cards (see documentation) from tweets as well as from replies, but also the "Website" link and others, which are usually concealed using shortened URLs. The extension only activates while browsing twitter.com.

enabledStateTitle.description: The title shown while hovering the cursor over the extension's icon in the toolbar when is is enabled.

disabledStateTitle.description: The title shown while hovering the cursor over the extension's icon in the toolbar when is is disabled.
